entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -10.3°C
